mvw.input_scale: Full repo; default Jest test suite (multiple TZ + full tests)

environment.methodology: tutorial.md one-pass profiling; peaks from process-tree measurement (measure_iamkun_dayjs.sh), RSS sampled every 0.5s for root and all child processes; MVW actually run (npm install + npm test).

static_triage.notes: JavaScript date library; Node/npm, Jest; no GPU, no large assets; Jest may use workers.

peaks_observed.cpu_utilization_summary: build moderate (npm install), run high (Jest full suite + coverage)

min_hardware.summary: 2 vCPU / 8 GB RAM / 1 GB disk, no GPU. Raw peaks (rounded up to SKU): build 0.10 GB RAM, run 4.17 GB RAM, disk 0.36 GB.
